parameters.body:
={{ JSON.stringify({
  "campaign_id": $json.campaignId,
  "email": $json.leadData.email,
  "first_name": $json.leadData.firstName,
  "last_name": $json.leadData.lastName,
  "company_name": $json.leadData.companyName,
  "custom_variables": $json.personalizationVars,
  "tags": $json.leadData.tags,
  "lead_score": $json.leadData.leadScore,
  "notes": `Prospect Intelligence Analysis - Lead Score: ${$json.leadData.leadScore}, Package: ${$json.leadData.recommendedPackage}, ROI Potential: $${Math.round($json.leadData.totalROI/1000)}K`
}) }}
